attributes.action: Make the decision making process for Safety camera more transparent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The decision to install a new safety camera is currently taken behind closed doors, I feel the reasons behind the camera should be published so the public can understand why the camera has been instaled

rejection.details: Please be more specific in the wording of this petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
